content.question: A certain rumor spreads through a community at the rate dy/dt = 2y(1 − y), where y is the proportion of the population that has heard the rumor at time t. (a) What proportion of the population has heard the rumor when it is spreading the fastest?

frqParts.text: A certain rumor spreads through a community at the rate dy/dt = 2y(1 − y), where y is the proportion of the population that has heard the rumor at time t. (a) What proportion of the population has heard the rumor when it is spreading the fastest?
(b) If at time t = 0 ten percent of the people have heard the rumor, find y as a function of t.
(c) At what time t is the rumor spreading the fastest?
